1b1(mdo sde): #/ rgya gar skad du/ Ur+ya sa ma tsA ra pra ta be drug gadz+ra ti pan
1b2(mdo sde): yulpAn ti nA ma me hA yA na sUtAM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yang dag pa
1b3(mdo sde): ga par
1b4(mdo sde): tshutshu nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhe
2a1(mdo sde): #// ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bum po drang po// sangs rgyas dang / byang
2a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'athams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
2a3(mdo sde): sasi se
2a4(mdo sde): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byed pa tran+da na/ rnyog pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i byed pa can gyi grong
2a5(mdo sde): rdal du snang ba 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i ril/ drang srong rta rlung zhes bya ba dka' thub lagan
2b1(mdo sde): pan/ dge slong gi dge 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
2b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sprul pa/ tshad med pa'i byams pa chen po byin gyis
2b3(mdo sde): brlabs kyi stobs rjes su thob pa/ tshad med pa'i snying rje chen po dang / sems can gyi chu bo kun tu 'chang bar rnam par sprul pa/ tshad med
2b4(mdo sde): pa'i dga' ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyis stobs kyis/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i dran pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas/ kun tu ngoms
2b5(mdo sde): pa dang / tshad med pa'i btang snyoms kyi ye shes kyis/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'jug pa la mkhas pa chos kyi sprin
3a1(mdo sde): #// dang / lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa'i mun pa chen po rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa/ bsdu
3a2(mdo sde): ba rnam bzhis sems can rnams chu bo bzhi las bsgral bar bya ba'i ye shes dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sems pa'i phyir/
3a3(mdo sde): byams pa dang khong khro ba med pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi lam yongs su dag pa/ chos kyis yang dag par 'jug pa/ ye shes chen po la mkhas pa//
3a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten la mchog gi lam yang dag par ston pa/ sems can rnam par rgyas shing / dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su sred pa'i chu bskam zhing ye shes
3a5(mdo sde): kyi las kyi mtha' la rab tu 'jug pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa zla ba lta bu/ sems can thams cad
3a6(mdo sde): kyi sems mtshungs par shes pa'i bsam pa mngon par yang dag par mgu ba'i phyir/ thabs la mkhas pa 'phel ba yang dag par ston pa/ nam
3b1(mdo sde): mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i gzungs kyis tshad med pa'i snod chos rin po che sa yongs su bkang zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phyir/ skye bo thams cad kyis nye bar 'tsho ba
3b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis rkang pa'i shugs chen pos chos kyi tshul gyi lam zab mo rjes su zhugs pa/ mtshungs pa'i chos kyis gzhan gyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod
3b3(mdo sde): pa bskul pa brgya stong grangs med pa'i mthar byang chub sems dpe'i spyod pa thug pa med cing rgyun ma bcad pa'i yon tan thams cad 'byung ba/ rlung dang mtshungs pa'i
3b4(mdo sde): sems 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ bag chags thams cad rjes su 'brel pa nyon mongs pa rab tu spangs pa/ tshad
3b5(mdo sde): med grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pas rnam par rtse ba la mkhas pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rta dang glang po che mi dkar
3b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab zla ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'gyi
3b7(mdo sde): pa mi zad pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dpa'o zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mig sngon po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngur sgo/
4a1(mdo sde): seng ge sgra 'byin ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor gyi 'od kyi tshogs shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab mtshams shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
4a2(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal mtshan rnam par sprul pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog gi phung po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i
4a3(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab stobs kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtogs 'dod mthu bo che zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
4a4(mdo sde): dpa' byams pa dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu ngo / sngon du 'gro drang srong rta rlung dang / drang srong stong phrag sum cu dang / lha bran brgya stong phrag bco
4a5(mdo sde): brgyad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bskor nas lhan cig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa la
4a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ legs par 'ongs pa de bzhin ga shegs pa'i seng ge'i khro ba shams pa de la bdag 'dug ste/ nyan thos rnams la nyan thos kyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro//
4a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa phyir mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir pho brang zlum po byas par gyur te/
4b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa la rnam par kun tu basmras te/ pho zang zlum por bshams pa nyid du bzhugs so// de nas dge slong
4b2(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang snyen las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang ni ba de logs su thul po sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la
4b3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ces bgyi ba btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni gang logs/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du
4b4(mdo sde): btags pas brtags pa ji lta lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag 'jig rten 'dzin
4b5(mdo sde): rten ces bya ba dang / de de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du btags pas/ brtags pa'i ji tsam zhes dge slong khyod de skad 'dri 'am/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no// de'i
4b6(mdo sde): phyir dge slong khyod legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// btsun pa de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ dge slong de bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan pa dang / bco
4b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten rnam pa gnyis te/ snod kyi 'jig rten dang 'du byed kyi 'jig rten no// dge slong de la/
5a1(mdo sde): snod kyi 'jig rten nI gang / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ni gang zhe na/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ji tsam pan
5a2(mdo sde): snod ces bya'o// dge slong de la na bri sa'i khabs yod de/ dge slong de la nang gi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ gang nang gi sra ba'i sgru ba nyid zin pa ni 'di lta ste/ rus pa dang
5a3(mdo sde): ser mo dang / so'i bar du ste/ 'di dag ni nang gi sa'i khams zhes bya'o// de la phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ gang lus kyi phyi rol gyi sa'i khams ni 'di lta ste/ 'gron du
5a4(mdo sde): dang gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / rdo dang / byu ru dang / dngul dang / swa le skam dang / bram bu dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang
5a5(mdo sde): shing dang / rtswa dang / sman dang / phyag dar dang / 'di dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams zhes bya'o// chu'i khams gang zhe na/ phyi rol gyi chu'i khams yod na/ nang gi chu khams
5a6(mdo sde): kyang yod de/ de la nang gi chu'i khams gang zhe na/ lus 'di la chu dang cu'i khams kyi mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / klad bdung / klung rgyas dang /
5a7(mdo sde): mchil ma dang / rdul dang / ngar snabs dang / snabs dang / rus dang / rkang dang / gcin yod pa kun tu len pa 'di ni/ nang gi chu'i khams zhes bya'o// de la phyi rol gyi
5b1(mdo sde): chu'i khams gang zhe na/ gang lus kyi phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ni 'di lta ste/ chu dang / chu'i khams kyi snum pa dang / 'o ma dang skrod du/ dar ba dang / bur ma dang / shing gi ro dang /
5b2(mdo sde): chang dang rtsab mo dang / bu ram chang dang / me tog chung dang / lus kyi phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ji tsam pa kun tu len pa 'di ni pha rol gyi chu'i khams so// de la nang gi me'i khams
5b3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ lus 'di la gang skye bo'i mdog gi dro ba kun tu len pa des lus 'di dra ba nyid/ du ba dang / gdungs pa dang / rims dang / yongs su tshig pa dang / des zos pa dang
5b4(mdo sde): 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / nyal ba de'i yang dag par yongs su smin par 'gyur ba 'di ni nang gi me'i khams zhes bya'o// de la phyi rol gyi me'i khams gang zhe na/ gang me'i
5b5(mdo sde): gdungs pa dang / nyi ma'i gdungs pa dang / nor bu'i gdungs pa dang / 'bru dang sman dang shing dang / rtswa'i dro ba dang / lci ba'i dro ba dang / phyag dar gyi dro ba dang / 'di dag ni phyi
5b6(mdo sde): rel gyi me'i khams zhes bya'o// de la nang gi rlung gi khams gang zhe na/ gang lus 'di la gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung dang / thur 'bru ba'i rlung dang / mazhu ba'i rlung dang / yan lag dang nying lag tu rgyu ba'i rlung dang /
5b7(mdo sde): 'di ni gi chung rnams zhes bya'o// de la phyiral gyi drung gang ne na gang phyi'o pa tu yang dag pa sru ba rdzi dang / rnam pa cu ba'i dru dang / ni chub dang / grang ba dang drong bangs byad pa mang ba dang / sa 'dzin pa'i drung dang phyirol gyi drung gi/
6a1(mdo sde): ma rdugs sa na ga ga nga ma pa na sa na// na me sum ldams
6a2(mdo sde): slo 'a nga gi 'byung ba chen po ban po 'di dag la gang mos pa'as/ dga' ba'am/ byams pa'am/ chags pa'am/ rtse che ba 'am nga yir bya ba'is/ bdag gi'i bya ba de thams cad spang
6a3(mdo sde): par bya'o nas sa sir bslab par bya'o// gang la la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i phyi dang nang gi 'am/ che ba'am/ phra ba'am/ danapa'am/ zam 'ag/ ga / gang sa ma[ред]
6a4(mdo sde): nga chen po bzhi po de thams cad de bzhi du so sor bslab par bya'o// gang la la 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag ni bdag gi ma yin/ bdag kyang de'i ma yin/ de yang bdag gi ma yin no zhes
6a5(mdo sde): de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dge slong dag dge slong gang la la 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di bdag la de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab
6a6(mdo sde): kyis shin tu brtan par byed do// shin tu yid la byas pa'i dge slong de srid pa dang / rgud pa dang / lus kyi sbyor ba'i rgyun gcod cing sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed pa ste/ dge slong dag
6a7(mdo sde): 'di ni snod kyi 'jig rten no// dge slong dag de la 'du byed kyi 'jig rten gang zhe na/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'du byed ces bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs te
6b1(mdo sde): bar led pa'i phung po dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung po ste/ dge slong dag 'di ni 'du byed kyi 'jig rten no// dge sbyong
6b2(mdo sde): ngag sems can ji tsam pa gang sems can gyi bsdu bas yang dag par bsdus pa de thams cad phung po 'di dag gis bsdus pa dang ldan pa 'di ni/ 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o// dge slong
6b3(mdo sde): dag nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de la gang mos pa 'am/ dga' ba 'am byams pa 'am/ chags pa'am/ rgya che ba 'am/ nga yir bya ba 'am/ bdag gir bya ba de thams cad spang bar bya'o//
6b4(mdo sde): zhes so sor bslab par bye'o// gang chung zad 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba 'am/ byi 'am nang gi 'am/ che ba 'am/ phra ba'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzung ba 'am/
6b5(mdo sde): gang ring ba 'am/ gang nye ba'i gzugs de thams cad bdag gi ma yin/ bdag kyang de'i ma yin/ de yang bdag ma yin no zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin
6b6(mdo sde): du blta bar bya'o// gang la la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba 'am/ phyi'i 'am/ nang gi 'am/ che ba'am/ phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ dang /
6b7(mdo sde): ring ba'am/ gang nye ba'i tshor ba dang / gang la la 'du shes dang / gang la la 'du byed dang / gang chung zad rnam par shes pa de thams cad ni bdag gi ma yin bdag kyang de ma yin
7a1(mdo sde): de bdag ma yin no zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya ba 'di ni/ dge slong dag snod kyi 'jig rten dang / 'du byed kyi
7a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug par gyur pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa
7a3(mdo sde): la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa phung po rnam par 'jig pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po lnga po 'di 'jig rten du bstan pa ni 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po dang /
7a4(mdo sde): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o// tshe dang ldan pa phung po lnga po de dag ni ji lta bu/ gzugs kyi phung po ni gang / 'dod pa'i khams mig dang
7a5(mdo sde): gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / de bzhin du rdi ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yod kyang mig dang / gzugs kyi 'gog pa yang dag
7a6(mdo sde): par gzhol ba zhig gam/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang
7a7(mdo sde): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral bas yang dag par gzhol ba ni gang ci gzugs kyi phung po 'dod pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs
7b1(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / nA dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / gzugs
7b2(mdo sde): dang gzugs med pa'i khams min dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dgu par gzhol ba 'am/ 'od tshor bu dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa
7b3(mdo sde): pa 'dod pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gcol ba dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags
7b4(mdo sde): dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba 'am/ ci 'das pa gzugs kyi phung po 'am/ mig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang
7b5(mdo sde): lce dang / lus dang / yid nas mig gi bar du'am/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam
7b6(mdo sde): 'on te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on te da ltar byung ba gzugs kyi phung po 'am/ mig dang gzugs kyi
7b7(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mig nas yid kyi bar du yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam
8a1(mdo sde): 'on te tshor ba nas yid kyi bar du'am/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa gzugs kyi phung po 'am/ mig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / de rnga ba nas yin/
8a2(mdo sde): kyi bar du yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on te tshor ba nas yid kyi bar du 'am/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba
8a3(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'god pa'i chos ltos/ mig gi bu gar gzugs kyi phung po dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba 'phos pa'ang ma yin/ mig gi bu gar tshor ba dang / 'du
8a4(mdo sde): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba 'phos pa yang ma yin/ skye mched ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing ljang nga 'dra ma yin/ phung po ni ngag gi
8a5(mdo sde): lam dang / dbyangs dang / sgra dang / brjod pa las yang dag par shin tu 'das pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni skad cig ma ste/ dngos po dang bral ba'o//
8a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni dbyangs med pa'o// dbyangs dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i lam ste mtshan ma med pa'o// chos thams cad ni yi ge med pa'o// smon pa med pa'o//
8a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni skyo ba med pa'o// stong pa'o// chos thams cad ni thob pa med pa'o// tshig med pa'o// chos thams cad ni rtog pa dang bral ba'o// mi khom pa'o// chos thams cad
8b1(mdo sde): ni chags pa dang bral ba'o// rkyen medapa'o// chos thams cad ni sbyor ba dang bral ba'o// dmigs pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni lta ba dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid dben pa'o//
8b2(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni dmigs pa dang bral ba'o// bdag med pa'o// chos thams ni bdag dang bral ba'o// brjod du med pa'o// chos thams cad ni yi ge dang bral ba'o// rab tu'i bya'o//
8b3(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni chos nyid mi thob pa'o// mi snang ba thob pa'o// chos thams cad ni snang ba dang bral ba'o// shin tu yul med pa'o// chos thams cad ni yul dang bral ba'o// shin tu/
8b4(mdo sde): rtsa ba med pa'o// chos thams ni dbang po med pa'o// shin tu rang bzhin med pa'o// chos thams cad ni spyod pa rnam par dag pa'o// gnyen po med pa'o// chos thams cad ni sems med pa'o//
8b5(mdo sde): chags pa dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni shin tu 'phros pa'o// phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni 'jungs pa med pa'o// spros pa med pa'o// chos thams cad
8b6(mdo sde): ni shin tu thasam gtan dang ldan pa'o// g.yo ba dang brel ba'o// chos thams ni shin tu sgrib pa med pa'o// rdul dang bral ba'o// shin tu dral ba'o// ches thams cad ni nyan mongs pa dang zag
8b7(mdo sde): chos chu // chos thams cad rtsom pa dang bral ba'o// dngos me nga'o// chos thams cad ni dngos po dang bral ba'o// byed pa med pa'o// chom thams cad
9a1(mdo sde): ston pa'o// tshor ba med pa'o// chos thams cad ni ram mkha' dang ldan pa'o// thos pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni dbyangs dang bral ba'o// gzung du med
9a2(mdo sde): pa'o// chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis skyug pa'o// shes pa med pa'o// chos thams ni tshor ba chags pa med pa'o// smig rgyu lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni 'du shes dang bral ba'o//
9a3(mdo sde): brag cha lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa'o// gzugs brnyan lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni rab tu sdang ba'i 'od rnam par dag pa chu zla lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni gzugs brlan/
9a4(mdo sde): dang bral ba'o// gzugs brnyan la rten pa'o// chos thams cad ni sprin mi dmigs pa'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan no// bstan du med
9a5(mdo sde): dwa'o/ dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po dang bral ba'o// batshan nyid med pa nas mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang / mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa dang mtsha
9a6(mdo sde): nyid myed pa'i bar du'o// chos rnams cad ni bdag med pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag tu mi dmigs pa'o// ngar sems pa med pa'o// rten med pa'o// brjod du med pa'o// chos thams
9a7(mdo sde): tshad ni mi ge med pa'i// rigs kyi bu 'du byed thams cad ni skad ci ma zad pa dang bral ba'o// zhes tshon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa med par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag dang gnan la gnod pa med pa/
9b1(mdo sde): myang med pa'i bapyod pa pasgom par bya'o// 'di la rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' da'i dang mi bzod pa pasgos pa na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam ma 'a'i masangos gis 'al par /
9b2(mdo sde): bzod pa zhes bya ba thob bo// bzod pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skad cig pa gcig dang yang dag par ldan pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las lhag par lu/
9b3(mdo sde): yongs su sprul to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyogs bcu stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga yi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
9b4(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char gtong ba ni 'di lta ste/ zas kyi char ram/ skom gyi char ram/ gos sam/ lhab lhub bam/ dri'am me tog gam/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi char kyang rab tu 'ong ngo //
9b5(mdo sde): gang sems can zas dang skem de yongs su zos pas/ zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa'i sems can de 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa/
9b6(mdo sde): stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang tshul khrims thob bo// khyim gyis bcings pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga sbyangs te byung nas/ ri'i sul dang / khyim med pa rjong pa'i nags tshul sdug
9b7(mdo sde): por gnas par 'gyur ro// drang srong gi cha byad kyis rtsa dang rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la mi bzad par mos shing brtson
10a1(mdo sde): 'grus rtsom pa la spo bar byed do// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rngu dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang /
10a2(mdo sde): bdag med par yid la byed do// mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo// tshangs pa dang 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gos nas rin po che yongs su sbyang ba'i bar du yongs su spyod par byed do//
10a3(mdo sde): de shes pas zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa nas tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bar du gzhol bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar de bzhin du gang yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam
10a4(mdo sde): mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di dag thob pa de snyim pas me tog nam mkha' la gtor ba'i me tog de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi stong pa dang / rlog pa lnga'i
10a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig ma gcig gis song ba'i me tog re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi sgo brjod pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad
10a6(mdo sde): dbyangs med pa'o// bdud bzhi'i yul las 'da' ba'o// chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i lam mo// gnas yang dag par sbyong ba'o// yi ge med pa'o// chos thams cad ni chags pa yang
10a7(mdo sde): dag par gzhol ba'o// mi skye ba'o// chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa yang dag par gzhol ba'o// ma 'gags pa'o// chos thams cad ni sngon gyi dam tshig mi gtong ba'o// mtshan nyid med
10b1(mdo sde): pa'o/ chos thams cad ni chags pa yang dag par gtong ba'o// rkyen med pa'o// chos thams cad ni kun tu sbyor ba yang dag par gtong ba'o// gnas med pa'o// chos thams cad de rtsom pa
10b2(mdo sde): med pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag gir bya ba dang / nga yir bya ba yang dag par gtong ba'o// chos thams cad ni dben pa'o// 'du 'dzi yang dag par gtong ba'o// bdag med pa'o// chos tha
10b3(mdo sde): cad ni bdag dang bral ba nas brjod du med pa'i bar du/ rab tu zhi ba'o// mi snang ba thob pa'o// mi gnas pa'o// shin tu yul med pa'o// shin tu rtsa ba med pa'o// shin tu rang bzhin med
10b4(mdo sde): pa'o// gnyen po med pa'o// kha zas med pa'o// shin tu 'thor ba'o// 'jungs pa med pa'o// shin tu bsam gtan byed pa'o// shin tu sgribs pa med pa'o// shin tu 'ong ba med pa'o//
10b5(mdo sde): nyam chung ba'o// dngos po med pa'o// byed pa med pa'o// tshor ba med pa'o// zag pa med pa'o// 'dzin pa med pa'o// rnam par shes pa med pa'o// srig mu lta bu'o// brag chal
10b6(mdo sde): bu'i// mig yor lta ngu'o// rgyu zla lta bu'o// gzugs brnyan lta bu'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// dngos po med pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa na sa mtshan nyid med pa dang mtshan nyid
10b7(mdo sde): da bral ba dang / mtsham po'i mtshan med dang / mtshan med gcig pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// ngang sems pa med pa'o// gadzu rje/
11a1(mdo sde): me pa'o// rjod du me pa'o// chos thams cad ni spyad cigama'o// 'du byed bad pa dang bral 'o zhes bzod pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o// tsham thams cad ma
11a2(mdo sde): cig ma zhes zhi ba'i sems bsgom par bya'o// mnyam pa'i sems dang rnam par zhi ba'i sems dang / 'dzin pa med pa'i sems dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems
11a3(mdo sde): dang / chod pa med pa'i sem dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i sems dang / rten med pa'i sems dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang / sdug bsngal gyi sems bsgom pa bya'o// de bzhin du/
11a4(mdo sde): bar zhi ba stong pa phyi dang nang gi 'jig pa brjod pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / tshad med grangs med pa'i chos kyi sgo me tog de dag la 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sems can de yang chos kyi sgo de thos nas
11a5(mdo sde): zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa des 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa/ stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang tshul khrims thob bo// khyim gyi bcing ba thams
11a6(mdo sde): cad dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang dag par spangs te byung nas ri'i sul dang / khyim med pa stong pa'i nags tshal stug por gnas par 'gyur ro// drang srong gi ma byad kyis 'bras bu dang /
11a7(mdo sde): rtsa ba dang / rgya'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro// se bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dpal mi bzad par mos shing / brtson 'grus rtso pa la spobang byid // nye bar le dang 'phung po lnga po 'di dag dang/
11b1(mdo sde): drang shub dang / zug rngu dang / mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par yid la byed do// mngon par shes pa lnga thodab do// tshangs pa dang 'jig rten la gzhol ba 'gyur
11b2(mdo sde): ro/ rigs kyi bu byang chub pas dpa' 'di 'dra ba'i bzod pa bsgom pa de ni mi dmigs/ sems can mi dmigs/ srog mi dmigs gsob me dmigs/ gang zag mi dmigs/ gzugs mi
11b3(mdo sde): dmigs tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/ mig mi dmigs rna ba yang ma yin/ sna yang ma yin/ lce yang ma yin/
11b4(mdo sde): lus kyang mi dmigs/ yid kyang mi dmigs so// gzugs mi dmigs/ sgra mi dmigs/ dri ma dmigs/ re mi dmigs/ reg mi dmigs/ chos mi dmigs/ yid mi dmigs
11b5(mdo sde): lus mi dmigs/ tshig mi dmigs/ sems dmigs so// stong pa nyid mi sogs pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ thug pa khams gsum gtong ba med pa/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa ma skyes pa
11b6(mdo sde): ma bsgoms pa/ ma byang ba'i bzod pa 'di smras so// ma byas pa/ bya ba med pa/ de sngon gyi mtha' la bya ba med pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' la 'das pa med pa/ dbus kyi mtha' la yang dag par bad
11b7(mdo sde): pa mi gnas pa mi dmigs pa/ yid la mi byed pa'i bzod pa bsgom pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba zhes
12a1(mdo sde): byang brjod pathong // byang na sasems dpa' bapod pa 'di thobapas/ jil bur gong dus shadapa'i rtsal 'di 'dra bya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dang 'a phung po ma pa
12a2(mdo sde): 'jig pas 'di bstan pa ston cing brjod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya bas legs so zhes bya ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag cang mi smra bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan
12a3(mdo sde): 'das cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes par gyur pa dang / de nas dge slong drug cu tsam 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu phung po rnam par 'jig pa ci la bsams te/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgyu ma 'dra ba'i 'du
12a4(mdo sde): byed thams cad ston/ gal te gzugs bdag med pa mi snang ba/ kun nas ldang ba med pa/ yid la mi byed pa/ mi rtog pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ dmigs pa med pa/ rgyu ba med pa 'am/ 'on te 'di
12a5(mdo sde): lta bu ci sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba 'am/ gso ba'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes pa 'am shed can nam/ byed pa po 'am/ tshor ba po'am/ tsher ba gzhan nam/ skye
12a6(mdo sde): ba'am/ yang dag par skye ba 'am/ gang mi dga' ba dang / mi 'byung ba med par 'gyur ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang du byung / snying rje chen po ni gang na/ chos 'chad pa ni su zhig/ chos kun
12a7(mdo sde): shes pa ni gang zhig/ bslab pa sdom pa ni gang na gnas/ gal te phung por mi 'gyur na/ de ltar khams dang skye mched rnams kyang dge ba rnams kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par mi 'gyur na/
12b1(mdo sde): legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu ni gang du smin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang du 'byung / nyan thos dang / rang rgyal
12b2(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / lha dang mi rnams dang / gang gzhan yang sems can gyi lus skye mched drug gis bzung ba ni gang du 'byung / bdag ni stan las langs te 'gro bar bya snyam mo// de nas
12b3(mdo sde): dge slong drug cu tsam stan las langs te dong nas/ dge slong gzhan dag kyang cang mi smra ba gyur pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa bcom ldan 'das la ngo tsha zhing mi spongs pa dang
12b4(mdo sde): gnod par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa la 'di skad ces
12b5(mdo sde): smras so// don gyi dbang gang mthong ba na 'khor smra ba dang bcas pa la chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta buzab mo yang dag par ston/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo snga gzhan las gang zag ldan pas la
12b6(mdo sde): kyigatam dang / gang+yas phA du dang / rlud 'i ma pal dang pa'i gtas da / smyangan pa dang / 'jus pA la gtong ba'i gtas dang / kA na pa dang rgyal khrims ngan pal tshul rnams kyi
12b7(mdo sde): dang / gams dang / ca na sus kyi tam dang / gam na bdas la ma mi gas 'bas shesa'ib kyi gtam dang / ga ya pa nas sa sasuM so/ ma kyi rjeg na /
13a1(mdo sde): basmya pa ya tha med pa byed pa rnaphral stong ta ma mi smra byas tshogs sa lus can rnams la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o// brkam pa rnams la chor badran pa nye bar
13a2(mdo sde): gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o// nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang kha zas la chags pa rnams la sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o// ngo tsha ba'i chos kyi rtsa ba spong ba rnams la chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
13a3(mdo sde): mi smra bar bya'o// mi thob par 'dod pa rnams la lhar skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin skye ba'i yon
13a4(mdo sde): tan mo smra bar bya'o// gzugs la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba bzung ba rnams la 'dod pa'i spyod pa'i lha dang dpal mi smra bar bya'o// gzugs med pa'i khams su skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la gzugs
13a5(mdo sde): la spyod pa'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// gzugs la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba bzung ba rnams la 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha'i bde ba mi smra bar bya'o// nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rang sangs
13a6(mdo sde): rgyus kyi yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la nyan thos kyi yon tan dag mi smra bar bya'o// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rang sangs rgyas
13a7(mdo sde): kye yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par 'dzin pa rnams la bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa pani mi smra bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'o/
13b1(mdo sde): mngon par brtson pa rnams la tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa ba ni mi smra bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor smra ba med pa la rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo zhi ba stong pa nyid kyi gtam mi smra bar bya'o//
13b2(mdo sde): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i 'khor rnam pa 'di lta bu'i smra ba dang bcos pa'i bdun du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zab mo 'di mami smra bar bya'o//
13b3(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po de thams cad dang ldan pas mgrin gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me la legs
13b4(mdo sde): so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis spro ba yang dag par bskyed do// legs so legs so shes rab che// rnam par shes pas mchog gcod pa// mtshan nyid thabs dang chos rnams kyi// dus ni khyod kyis
13b5(mdo sde): rab tu shes// 'khor rnams shes pa ci 'dra ba// de 'dra'i tshul du ston par byed// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa la// chos 'di brjod par mi byed do// nam mkha' mtshungs shing mnyam pa
13b6(mdo sde): yi byang chub sems dpa'i mdun dag tu// chos 'di rab tu bsten pas na// tshul 'di rab tu shes par 'gyur// nam mkha' ji ltar mtho byed la// dma' ba med cing gzugs med
13b7(mdo sde): pa bshes rab rol phyin spyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid med// bzhal ba grangs med pa dgag/ 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar ni// smra ba med pa'i 'khor rnams la//
14a1(mdo sde): khyod kyi chos 'di thos pa dang // ji ltar rgyal ba des bstad pa'i// grags pa chen po'i bzod pa 'di// brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems can la// 'jigs med pa 'di
14a2(mdo sde): rab tu bstan// byang chub sems dpa' rab bdag cing // yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' med pa// skal ba ldan pa'i mdun du ni// chos 'di yang ni rab tu bstan// nyan thos theg pa mngon brtson dang /
14a3(mdo sde): rang rgyal dag gis mngon dga' la// chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na// de nyid 'tshang rgyar mi 'gyur ro// mi shes pas ni spong ba dang // mos pa med par skyes pas na// bsod nams mang po 'byung med
14a4(mdo sde): cing // ngan 'gror yang ni myur du 'gro// ting 'dzin bzod pa'i gzungs kyis ni// gal te de lus dbyangs byas te// byang chub lam la brtson pa'i phyir// la la thabs dang bral ba la// 'khor
14a5(mdo sde): dang gang zag rnams kyis kyang // sems kyis rtog par mi byed do// 'chal pa'i shes rab sdod min la// stong pa'i zhi ba smra bar byed// de yang myur du spangs pas na// mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs
14a6(mdo sde): pra dag/ gzhan dag gi ni gnas bcul// myur du yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur// dmyal ba yi dgas byil song dri// lha ma yin dang lus srul po// gnid sbyin srin po btum po medi// la lani 'dir skye'o//
14a7(mdo sde): mi myur dka' byed thob pa dag/ gal te ji ltar thob na yang // srad po'i gdol pa rnams dang ni// 'on pa long pa zhar ba dang // rtag tu na dang lam chung ba// skur pa 'debs shing mchod pa med/
14b1(mdo sde): zas dang sgrom dang bral ba ste// mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur// pa dang ma la bskur sti med// nyes par byas pa rtag tu spyod// sems can rnams la snying rje med// ngan 'gror
14b2(mdo sde): yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur// 'drir ni rab tu song ba yi// dge slong drug cu tsam 'di dag/ yid kyis rtog pa zhe sdang ba// ngan 'gror yang ni myur du 'gro// lus dbang byas pa'i sems can 'di/
14b3(mdo sde): gang gis bzod pa 'di bstan cing // thabs la mngon sum ma yin pa// des ni dge slong de song ngo // ye shes thabs dang ldan pa dang // pha rol sems la lta ba yi// 'jig rten la ni sgron 'a
14b4(mdo sde): pa// sems can kun la phan par smra// thams cad don gyi rjes shes pa// thog mar yang ni 'khor ltos la// ci 'drar 'gyur ba'i 'khor rnams la// de 'drar bar ni chos kyang shod/
14b5(mdo sde): de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ji lta bur nyan thos kyis// bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri ba shams te//
14b6(mdo sde): thos 'dul ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis yongs su shes so// rigs kyi bu yang 'dis sngon ma thos pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan pan//
14b7(mdo sde): yang bcom ldan 'ongs kyim dzal bung bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul rnam ma la'i mngag gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa yon tan gyis rigs pa sbyor ba che thos pan/
15a1(mdo sde): par bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab cing / bdag dang sems can gzhan la yang thugs brtse ba'i slad du rjes su gzung bar 'gyur snyam mo//
15a2(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar mes byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu gang gi dus la dab par shes/ de nas byang chub sems
15a3(mdo sde): dpa' lag na mar me stan las langs te/ bla ges phrag pa gcig tu byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa
15a4(mdo sde): 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// thub pa tshangs pa rab tu dga' mdzad pa// ye shes nyams pa'i 'gro la sgron ma 'dzin// grol dang rig la khyod ni dang bar mdzad//
15a5(mdo sde): rdul dang bral ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di ston// rgyal ba nyi ma 'gro la mar me mdzad// sems can du ma la ni snang mdzad pa// lam rnams rab stor lam ni khyod ston pa// mchog gi chos kyi
15a6(mdo sde): sgo 'di bstan par mdzod// nam mkha'i rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i thugs// gathugs dam mi g.yo ji ltar ri brtan bzhin// thub pa 'jig rten zla ba'i 'od 'drag/ tshul mdog bzod
15a7(mdo sde): pa'i dge ba 'di yang ston// snying rje gnas shing 'gro la bzod mdzad pa// khyod kyi chog shes pa ni mchog tu che// rga shind gsum rab tu ni mdzad pa// bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'di
15b1(mdo sde): yang stod// thub pa seng ge su sregs 'jig par mdzad// 'gro ba dga' mdzad ka la bina'i skad// su migs can gyi 'khor mangs nas 'jig pa// mar ma'i bzod pa 'di yang
15b2(mdo sde): bstan par mdzod// sa dang mnyam pa bzod pa mchog gi thugs// bde dang sdug bsngal reg la khrom mi mdzad// mthon po ma yin da ltar mthong min pa// yongs smin gzigs te bzod
15b3(mdo sde): pa 'di yang gsungs// ye shes mchog gis nga ying rgyal gyi// rlung langs lta bu'i nyon mongs dgra yang gtor// des ni bzod pa'i dam pa 'di thob pa// lam gyi mi yis srid pa'i chu
15b4(mdo sde): yang bskams// khyod kyis lta ba lcug ma sred chu tshig/ klu lta bur ni chos kyi char gtong ba// des ni 'khor 'di dga' bar gyur pa ste// yongs su smin pa gzigs shing bzod 'di gsum
15b5(mdo sde): sems can rnams la rnam grol yon tan skyed// bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'di ston cing // gang gi bsam pa dri ma med bzod 'gyur// de thob pa yi yon tan 'di mtha' yas// spyod
15b6(mdo sde): yul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba mo// thub pas 'das pa'i bzod pa 'di gsungs dang // da ltar gyi'ang bzod pa 'di gsungs pa// thugs rjer dgongs spyod bzod pa 'dri rdzo
15b7(mdo sde): gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sims dpa' rin chen lagan kyang mi gsung bas nal gyis pazhes so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di bram du dgos te
16a1(mdo sde): sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gang na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan pa
16a2(mdo sde): nga yang dgongs so snyam/ lha bran gyis gsol pa/ spos kyi ngad ldan pa'i ri la sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bzod pa 'di bstan nas ji lta bu spos kyi ngad ldan pa'i ri la sngon
16a3(mdo sde): gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di bshad par 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid ye
16a4(mdo sde): shes bstan pa la 'jug go/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das skar mda'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das drang srong
16a5(mdo sde): gi brtul zhugs dang / spyod lam dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kun tu snang ste/ drang srong de yang rgan po dang / rgas pa dang / 'khogs pa dang / sgra ril pa'i ral pa 'chang ba dang / ag
16a6(mdo sde): tses ring po dang / dbyug pa dang / ril ba dang / gtsang ma 'dzin me'i sbyin srog cher po 'bar ba byed do// de las kyang 'od kyi phung po kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang kha //
16a7(mdo sde): rgya stong du ma dang / kha dog rgya chen po shin tu yongs su dag pa dri ma med po'i 'od 'byung ngo // de'i 'od snang bas phyogs bcu'i spong ba dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas su 'o/
16b1(mdo sde): ba'i skad ma dang / rin po che dang / glog dang / 'od dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin gyi 'od kyang mi mngon mi snang ngo // sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang /
16b2(mdo sde): yi dgas kyi lta ba yang mi mngon mi snang ngo // de'i tshe drang srong thub pa ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyi sgra dang / brjod pa dang / dbyangs dang tshig dang / yi ge dang / chung ngun sa dang / chung ngam
16b3(mdo sde): dang rlung gi sgra yang mi grag go// de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa na/ sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag thams cad dang drang srong
16b4(mdo sde): gi brtul zhugs dang / lus dang mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kun tu snang ngo // yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong ma gtogs par/ nyan thos sam/ nyan thos dang / rang
16b5(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i theg pa pa'i drang srong ni kun tu mi snang ngo // yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong des/ nyan thos dang / rangs pa rgyas mi mthong zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
16b6(mdo sde): theg pa pa ma mthong ngo // de'i tshen gang yang nyan ces 'khor dang 'dug pa des de bzhin gshegs pa mi mong shing de byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par mi mthong ngo // gang yang 'ding 'dug 'phru
16b7(mdo sde): pa 'dus par gyur ba gzhan du na cung zad gzugs snang ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / snang ba rgya chen pos ni 'jig rten thams cad khyab par yang dag pa ngas su mi mthong ngo /
17a1(mdo sde): denas rgyun byos rkyen mo ngas kun shes ko wa di n+ya la smras pa/ gnas btan go rkyen na bcom ldan 'das gangan/ gos de sa smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das dkyu ga
17a2(mdo sde): gnas bya ba ni mi shes so// mi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des 'od srungs chen po la smras pa/ spangs pa smrab zhing na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/
17a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang nab soms shig/ 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na zhes bya ba mi shes so// mi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po
17a4(mdo sde): des tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la smras pa/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba soms shig/
17a5(mdo sde): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas med pas/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na zhes bya ba mi shes so// mi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po/
17a6(mdo sde): des mo'u gal yan la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo ru 'gal yan rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i nan bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba soms
17a7(mdo sde): yos gal yanas smras pa/ gang gi dang ldan pa'i srungs ris smos pa/ de na bdag gis slong gsum gyi stong chedapa' 'jig rten gyi mas ni rje 'phrul gyi snyings kyis rjes
17b1(mdo sde): shes bya/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gangan zhugs pa gang du bzhud ces bya ba ni mi mthong ngo // mi shes so// de nas nyan thos chen po ngas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la smras pa
17b2(mdo sde): lnga'i mig gi nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud/ gang na gnas/ spyod pa ni ci 'dra ci 'dra bar spyod/ khyod kyi lha'i mig gis ltos
17b3(mdo sde): ma 'gags pas smras pa/ kho bos 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par bltas na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs/ gang du bzhud
17b4(mdo sde): ces bya ba bdag kyang mi shes so// mi mthong ngo // des smras pa/ yang tha dad par yang dag par shes pa thob pa'i nyan thos kyi ye shes gang la'ang mi 'jug gi/ bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems
17b5(mdo sde): dpa'a'i ye shes de la ni 'jug go// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud/ gang na bzhugs zhes byang chub sems dpa' la dri snyam pa dang de nas nyan thos chen po des/
17b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di la rigs kyi bu gzhan zhig gis/ phung po bshad par byas pa de na
17b7(mdo sde): dge slong drug cu tsam po ldan las langs so dong bas/ tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das thugs me dgyes nas btang snyoms shing / 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas rigs bu dang thabs gcig tu
18a1(mdo sde): spyod do/ bdag cag ni rang rang gi spyil por zhugs shing / bsam gtan bya snyam ste/ de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rang rang gi spyil por zhugs nas bsam
18a2(mdo sde): gtan byed do// de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can de/ bdag drang srong gi cha
18a3(mdo sde): byang du mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag cag drang srong du gyur pa na/ gang drang srong las shin tu khyad par 'phags pa ste/ bdag cag gi mkhan por gzung ngo zhes/ bdag cag rnam
18a4(mdo sde): par blta bar bya'o// skam pa de dag thams cad rlog pa sel ba zhes bya ba byed pa can gyi grong rdal na/ drang srong chen po shAkya thub pa rgas pa 'khogs pa gtugs pa'i rnam pas/ me tog dang / 'bras
18a5(mdo sde): bu dang / sman dang / zas dang / skom rnam pa sna tshogs kyis me la gtor ba thag mi ring bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong chen po 'di nus pa chen po mthu chen po 'di'i mthus snang ba chen po
18a6(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // drang srong 'di gang na ba de logs su nye bar 'gro zhing / drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang / spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o snyam mo// / bam po gnyis pa/
18a7(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' drang srong bye ba khrag khrig pargya stong bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du le bar dong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong ting nge 'dzin
18b1(mdo sde): dang / bzod pa dang / bzung bang du byas pa de sems rtse gcig pa ma spobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'dabral mchod pa las kyi byung / brtson pa bye kyi mam mjed kyi 'jig na gyi'ams 'dig
18b2(mdo sde): dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / ldu ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'ab ci dang / lho 'ab chen po dang / mi dang mi ma men pa la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad drung srong
18b3(mdo sde): gi cha byad kyis/ drang srong shAkya thub pa'i thad du der nye bar dong ngo // 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de/ bcom ldan 'das ji lta bur spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la bzhud nas/ den yang dag par spyod pa'i
18b4(mdo sde): tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di ston pa'i phyir/ chos can dang chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis la yang 'jug par bzhed pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so//
18b5(mdo sde): bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir/ lam brgyan pa sbyang bar bya zhing / lam des drang srong gi mchog spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la nye bar 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste/ de nas klu'i rgyal
18b6(mdo sde): po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / nor mdog dang / 'jog po dang / yid 'ong la sogs pa/ klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag cu drug cu tsam lhan cig tu drang srong gi cha byad kyis/
18b7(mdo sde): lha rdzas kyi rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / byi ru dang / asma gar pa dang / mu sa ra gal pa la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la'i 'phreng ba gas
19a1(mdo sde): ci gang la dngul kyi lo ma dang ma ton dang / bras bu dang / dngul gyi shing la gser gyi lom dang / matog dang / 'bras du nas/ su sa dgal la shing gi bapar tshu
19a2(mdo sde): me sna bdun gyi lom dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i 'phreng ba'i rgan gyis lam de btsun par sprul to// shing ta la'i 'phreng ba de la lha rdzas kyi gos stong phrag bye ba rnam pa dusadas pa sna tshogs mngon pa
19a3(mdo sde): rab tu 'phyang ngo // lha de dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dka' thub kyi gnas nas/ spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i bar du lam gyi zheng dpag tshad bcu pa sbyangs so// lam gyi mu gnyis su lha rdzas kyi
19a4(mdo sde): gser nas mu sa ra gal ba'i bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bur sprul to// gser gyi shing ta la dngul gyi snying po 'phyang ba nas/ mu sa ra gal ba'i bar du smra bar bya'o// 'og logs su baM
19a5(mdo sde): rlurA bzang po nas gong logs kyi gnas su shes kyi bar du/ rgya chen pos smra bar bya'o// sprin gyi lha'i bu drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ lam gyi mu gnyis su rdzing rnyog pa med pa rin po sna bdun gyi them skas can gyi
19a6(mdo sde): rdzid de dag la gser gyi bye ma gdal ba/ rdzing de dag la yang lha rdzas kyi me tig yut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pun+da ri ka dang / a ti mu ta ka dang / tsam pa ki dang / a sho ka dang /
19a7(mdo sde): mu tsu kun da dang / mon dzu sha ka dang / pad li dang / pa ri sha ka 'gan dan ba ska ri dang / su ma dang / amra dang / 'dzam du dang / mr-i la dang / mchog tu drirnam pa rnam pa chog
19b1(mdo sde): su mdod par sprul to// sa byu ma myi gnod sbyin drang slong gi rba bud kyis lam sbyong bar byed do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lnga'i bu yang drang srong gi cha byad kyi lam gyi mu gnyis la lha rdzas kyi rin po ma
19b2(mdo sde): bdun gyi rgyal mtshan mchog 'dzin to// rgyal mtshan gyi mchog de dag la lha rdzas kyi gos dang / du sha dang / rgyan rab tu 'byung ngo // 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lha rdzas
19b3(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyi khang bu brtsegs ma mngon par sprul to// khang bu brtsegs ma de dag gi phyogs bzhi kun tu rin po che sna bdun bgyis so// khang bu brtsegs ma de la yang lha rdzas kyi du sha sna tshogs byung ngo //
19b4(mdo sde): gos sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo // me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu gtor to// khang bu brtsegs ma de la lha rdzas kyi rol mo rgya chen po yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs byung ngo //
19b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rol mo dkrol ba dang / klu'i sla bsngags pa des/ spyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad smras khyab par gyur to// klu'i bu mo ba
19b6(mdo sde): stong phrag drug cu cu brgyad lam mdzes pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ drang srong gi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi char bab bo// dga'
19b7(mdo sde): ldan lha'i bu brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi ma pyad kyis 'di lta ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog mno ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dang / tsam pa ka dang / pa ri ya Sha dang / 'jog dang / 'jog
20a1(mdo sde): gachen po dang / rotsa dang / ro cag chen po dang / bal la dang / bral la chen po dang / tsakra dang / tsa chen po'i 'od drim med pa dang / 'das ma ts+tsha
20a2(mdo sde): mthong ba/ 'dab ma brgya spyong pa/ kun nus 'od/ kun+d+ha nas dri kun nas rnam par rgyu ba'i drI/ rtag tu me tog 'od srung ba/ kha drog mtha' med pa/ bltar 'os pa/ mig gis mngo/
20a3(mdo sde): par dga' ba/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lam de mdzes par byas so// char pa'i sprin gyi lnga'i bu brgya stong
20a4(mdo sde): dum dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis chu las skyes pa dang / zang las skyes pa'i me tog gi char rab tu phub bo// klu'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi chu byad kyis yang dag par gnas shing
20a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ mu tig sngon po'i char dang go shir sha'i snying po'i char la sogs te/ char sna tshogs rab tu phab bo// gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
20a6(mdo sde): 'dir sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha'am/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ klu 'am/ klu'i dbang po nas/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
20a7(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / grul bum gyi dbang po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i bar du de thams cad drang /
20b1(mdo sde): srong gi cha byad kyis me tog sna tshogs dang / 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / rol mo dkrol ba sna tshogs dang / brdung ba dang / glu sna tshogs yongs su
20b2(mdo sde): bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das spyan myi 'dzum pa'i zhal la rnam par blta ba'i phyir 'khod de// gang la la stong gsum gyi spyong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lha'i bu ma 'am/ gnod sbyin
20b3(mdo sde): kyi bu mo 'am/ nam mkha' lding gyi bu mo 'am/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo 'am/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la
20b4(mdo sde): mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / glu yongs su bzung ste/ dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi khadog gi gos kyi char 'ang
20b5(mdo sde): kyis rab tu phab bo// mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa sna tshogs kyi las kyis phyir brtson no// tshangs pa'i dbang po sngon byang chub tu
20b6(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya sbyong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la bskyod cing spyan sngar 'khod do// brgya byin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang skyong gi cha byed kyis phyag
20b7(mdo sde): 'tshal bar byed cing / mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byed kyis bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo// dri za'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rab tu gsal ba'i
21a1(mdo sde): / pa ts+tsha na spyong sa sma la
21a2(mdo sde): ngas
21a3(mdo sde): nga rgyung slo
21a4(mdo sde): ldan sa la zhingasu
21a5(mdo sde): me ma 'a sa
21a6(mdo sde): na ma
21a7(mdo sde): du byas
21b1(mdo sde): tu 'bengs so// gnod sbyin gyi bu mo brgya stong dum yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya spyong dum myang ma srong gi ma byung kyis rgyan
21b2(mdo sde): gyi char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// nam mkha' lding gi bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo brgya stong
21b3(mdo sde): dum yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ nam mkha'i dkyil rgyan par byed do// sa'i gnod sbyin brgya sbyong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dbyangs gtong bar byed do// bar snang gi gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma yang /
21b4(mdo sde): drang srong gi ma byad kyis nam mkha' la 'phyan to// bdud brgya stong du ma yang drang srong go cha byad kyis/ lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra 'byin pa la 'jug go/ drang srong lnga brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa ba'i
21b5(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dang / drang srong stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyos brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dag lha rdzas kyi me tog man+da rab
21b6(mdo sde): chen po blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir/ rnyog pa sel ba nas spos kye ngang ldang ba'i ri'i bar du mtshams sbyor ba rab tu byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das bzhud pa'i zhabs
21b7(mdo sde): kyis/ me tog gi snying po kun tu gnod par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu'i ma dang zla ba brgya stong phrag du ma yang drang srong go cha byad kyis/ me tog gi chu bo'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// dri za
22a1(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rol mo dkrol bas/ drang srong thub pa'i sku la 'od gzer bye ba brgya stong 'byung ngo // de nas lha'i bu
22a2(mdo sde): yon tan can zhes bya ba smos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la gnas pa/ lha drang brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/
22a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// sems can mi bsrun grol byed rkang gnyis mchog/ mnyes dka' rgyal ba
22a4(mdo sde): gzugs ngan 'dren mdzad cing / sdug bsngal gzir la bde ba'i mchog sbyin pa// rgyal ba rkang gnyis dam pa 'dir gshegs gsol// sred pa rab spangs rnam thar gsum ston cing // 'gro
22a5(mdo sde): la dus gsum nang na ye shes kyis// bslab pa gsum ston dri ma gsum spangs pa// khams gsum las 'das thub pa 'dir gshegs gsol// 'gro la phyin ci log bzhi rnam pa grol/
22a6(mdo sde): 'khor bzhi dag gis zhabs la bsnyen bkur cing // 'gro la 'phags pa'i bden bzhi rab ston pa// zla ba bas kyang lhag pa 'dir gshegs gsol// thub pa phung po lnga 'di rab ston pa// 'dod
22a7(mdo sde): pab lnga las skye bo rnams grol zhing // 'phags pa'i shes rab yan lag lnga ston pa// 'gro ba lnga yi btsin ra rnam par dkrol// dbang po drug tu gnas pa skyon med cing // sred lus drug la shin tu
22b1(mdo sde): rnam grol shes// sum cu rtsa drug dran sngon sems can mchog/ spos kyi dang ldang ri 'dir gshegs su gsol// rgyal ba ma'am gzhag rab tu dul ba'i thugs// shin tu bsgoms pa byang chub
22b2(mdo sde): rnam pa mchog/ ye shes sems can bye bar rab du la mdzad// kha lo rab sgyur spos dang ri 'dir ston// rgyal ba ye shes sems can rab ston pa// ye shes kyis ni 'jig rten snang mdzad das/
22b3(mdo sde): ni mun pas bsgribs la ye shes ston// thub pa dgon pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// 'dzam bu gling 'dir sangs rgyas byung ba dag/ 'di la sngon gyur la la thar 'dod cing // mi yi dang/
22b4(mdo sde): po byang chub 'dir thob pa// mi yi 'dren mkhan khyod ni 'dir gshegs gsol// sbyin dang 'dul ba stong zhing dul ba'i thugs// sems can nang na gtso bo stobs bcu'i mchog/ sems can
22b5(mdo sde): dbul la gnyen pa 'phags pa khyod// spos kyi ngang ljang ri 'dir gshegs su gsol// bar 'ga' khyod kyis lo drug dka' mdzad cing // bar 'ga' rgyal ba bdud phyir shing la bzhugs/
22b6(mdo sde): dpa' bo tshul gcig tu ni lam ston pa// thub pa 'dir gshegs bzod pa rab tu ston// wA raN+Da sir 'khor lo ngom pa bskor// shes rab dam pa dag gi mdzod cig gsungs// 'jig rten
22b7(mdo sde): thams cad 'di la khur bor ba// spos kyi ngang ldang ri 'dir bzod pa gsungs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha dums mdun du bdar cing / byang chub sems dpa' dums bskor nas/
23a1(mdo sde): gdan las bzhengs pa dang de nyid kyi tshe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lan drug tu rab tu g.yos so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
23a2(mdo sde): 'dir gang sems can nyan thos sam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ gang yang sems can gzhan thams cad gang nam mkha' la rgyu ba 'am/
23a3(mdo sde): gang sa la rgyu ba 'am/ gang chu la rgyu ba de thams cad dran pa rgya chen po so sor thob bo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag mthil du skyes pa snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par mthong
23a4(mdo sde): ngo mig gis gzugs la ni cung zad kyang snang bar mi 'gyur ro// gang yang sems can dka' thub ngan pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa de yang ngo mtshar chen po thob bo// 'di lta ste/ me'i brtul zhugs
23a5(mdo sde): can dang / zla ba'i brtul zhugs can dang / nyi ma'i brtul zhugs can dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi brtul zhugs can dang / de la sogs pa'i sems can gang la la lta ba nyam nga ba rnam pa sna tshogs
23a6(mdo sde): thob pa/ log pa la lta ba can de thams cad dka' thub ngan pa spangs nas/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su bltas so// ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na rnam pa de lta bu'i sa g.yo ba 'di dang / snang ba chen po
23a7(mdo sde): 'di 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po'i spyan snga na/ gang me'i phung po chen po 'dug pa de yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam du mngon par sprul te/ phyogs
23b1(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi snying 'di rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par ba dag pa tshad med grangs med pa rnams su gcor do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho myong /
23b2(mdo sde): kha'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar mer snang bde/ me tog man+dA ra ba chen por kun tu gnas pa 'dug par gyur to// 'khor rngo tsam pa 'dus pa dang / gang sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de thams cad pa
23b3(mdo sde): srong gi cha byad kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan sngar 'khod do// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bogad+hA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las shin tu
23b4(mdo sde): te de na rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyul mtshan gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshe skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na de bzhin
23b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po bza' shing go ra ba'i dpal zhes
23b6(mdo sde): bya ba de drang srong gi gzugs dang / lus dang dbyibs kyis bdag mthong ngo // gzhan yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu thams cad drang srong gi gzugs dang lus dang / dbyig
23b7(mdo sde): kyis mthong ngo // mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal la yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na/ gang me tog mer snang ba bai DUR+Ya'i dbyig pa 'di
24a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur/ theg pa chen po 'di dag la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin par grub/
24a2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyis/ rigs kyi bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
24a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dug cing / rlog pa lnga'i 'jig rten du 'jug pa na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma
24a4(mdo sde): dang dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'khor bzhi dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i
24a5(mdo sde): bzod pa bstan par 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul te// gsol pa/ bzod pa 'di'i
24a6(mdo sde): thob ma 'am/ tha ma 'am/ ji lta bu zhig/ bka' stsal pa/ bzod pa 'di ni mu stegs can thams cad la 'jug pa'o// de ltar mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/ sems can chu bo
24a7(mdo sde): bzhis khyer ba rnams las sgrol bar byed pa'o// chu bo bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i chu bo dang / lta ba'i chu bo dang / sred pa'i chu bo dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo 'di dag las sems can sgrol/
24b1(mdo sde): bar byed pa'o// dad pa mi byed pa pazhi yang dag par len du 'jug pa/ 'jug par byed pa/ so sor dgod par byed pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dad pa mi byed pa/ sems can
24b2(mdo sde): rnams yang dag par len du 'jug pa/ 'jug par byed pa/ so sor dgod par byed pa'o// bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor byed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi phung pos
24b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams 'dod pa'i chu bo las grol bar byed pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi phung pos sems can rnams lta ba'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// shes rab kyi phung pos sems can rnams
24b4(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i chu bo las sgrol byed pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i phung pos sems can rnams srid pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// sangs rgyas la dad pa mi byed pas/ sems can rnams theg
24b5(mdo sde): nga chen pos sgrol bar byed pa'o// chos la dad pa mi byed pas/ sems can rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o// dge 'dun la dad pa mi byed pas/ sems can rnams
24b6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o// 'phags pa yid du 'ong ba'i tshul khrims kyis lta bar song ba thams cad spong ba la ston par byed pa'o// sbyin pas sems can rnams tshe'i rgya mtsho
24b7(mdo sde): las sgrol bar byed pa'o// ngag sman pas lta ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o// don bya bas sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o// don mthun pas sems
25a1(mdo sde): can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu sgrol bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la bka' stsal du
25a2(mdo sde): gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir bdag cag nye bar mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgya mtshan
25a3(mdo sde): gyi dpal des yang rigs kyi bu gang gi dus la dbab par shes na zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas rigs kyi bu ye shes dpal dang / bza' shing gi ra ba'i dpal de
25a4(mdo sde): gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal de la/ drang srong gi cha byad kyis rkang pa gnyis
25a5(mdo sde): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas te 'khod do// skad cig ma gcig tsam gyis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das drang
25a6(mdo sde): slong shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te/ 'khod par gyur to// de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa rnams drang srong gi cha byad
25a7(mdo sde): kyis shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par ma dag pa tshad med grangs med pa 'dir skad cig ma gcig gis lhags so// de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi sangs
25b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das te/ de na ri rab kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po zhes
25b2(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog gi mchog ces bya ba dang /
25b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis drang srong gi cha byad dang / lus dang gzugs dang / dbyibs kyis bdag mthong ngo // sngon ma byung ba'i thub pa chen po gzhan yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mthong nas/
25b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po de la yongs su zhus pa de bzhin du ji lta bur gong du bshad pa nas/ de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ de na
25b5(mdo sde): 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa dpal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod
25b6(mdo sde): par mthong ba dang / ku mu da'i glang po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA gsum gyi bye ma sbed las
25b7(mdo sde): shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ den rgyan gcig ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub
26a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
26a2(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du chu bo gang+gA gcig gi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste// de nas me tog chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi rgyal
26a3(mdo sde): mtshan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal chen po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du
26a4(mdo sde): bshad pa nas/ yang steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA bdun gyi bye ma snyed nas shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ de na 'od snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten
26a5(mdo sde): gyi khams de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' chos
26a6(mdo sde): kyi dbyangs dang / bdud rtsi dbyangs shes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gnyis kyang ji snyed gong du bshad pa bzhin no// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin pas mi mjed kyi
26a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa 'di kun tu rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong chen po shAkya thub pa gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// mi mjed
26b1(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par ma zhugs pa ni/ drang srong go cha byad kyis ma gyur pa'o// rgyun de dag la nyan thos sam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa
26b2(mdo sde): 'amarang sangs rgyas sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas kyang mi mthong na/ sems can gzhan gyis mthong bar mi'i gyur pa lta ci skyes/ de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong
26b3(mdo sde): chen po gdan de las bzhengs te thub pa dbang po'i 'gros dang / tshangs pa dbang po'i 'gros dang / tshangs pa drang srong gi 'gros dang / mnya' shing du blta ba'i 'gros dang / nye bar zhi ba'i 'gros dang /
26b4(mdo sde): rab tu zhi ba'i 'gros dang / dge slong rnams mos pa chen po'i 'gros dang / lha dga' ba'i 'gros dang / gnod sbyin dul ba'i 'gros dang / lha ma yin dga' bar byed pa'i 'gros dang / klu dul ba'i 'gros
26b5(mdo sde): dang / rgyal ba nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'gros dang / rnam par grol ba'i 'gros kyi 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'gros su bzhud cing / sangs rgyas chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'gros dang / rgya chen po'i 'gros dang /
26b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs chen po'i 'gros su bcom ldan 'das spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la me tog gi ze ba la zhabs 'deg pa dang / 'dor bas bzhud nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la byon to//
26b7(mdo sde): dka' thub kyi gnas gtsang ma dri tha dad pa med cing / dri ma med pa'i phyogs su 'gro sel gyi lha mo chen mo 'od 'dres pa zhes bya ba gang na bde na/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ glang po'i rnam
27a1(mdo sde): par lta ba'i tshul gyis rnam par bltas par gyur pa de'i dus na yang 'di brjod do// la la gang 'dir brtan dang ldan pa la// byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems bskyed pa// bdag
27a2(mdo sde): gis yang dag spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir// de dag thams cad bdag gi mdun du 'ong // byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs spangs me gang // da dung du yang 'khor ba'i bde 'dod cing // chos la bdag med rab
27a3(mdo sde): tu mi shes pa// bdag ni de dag thams cad 'ong na ston// kun tu sbyor ba spangs med gang dag kyang // sgyu ma'i phung ltar shin tu sngon mthong zhing // thabs la mkhas par yang ni mi shes pa// de dag tham
27a4(mdo sde): cad 'ong na bdag ston to// brtson 'grus ldan pa bsod nams mdzod mang po// thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams 'dul zhing // shes rab pha rol phyin mchog rtag spyod pa// bzod nyan thos
27a5(mdo sde): phyin de dag thams cad 'ong // gang gis sangs rgyas du ma sngon bsnyen bkur// 'dus byas thams cad 'di la rten pa med// chu zla lta bur rab tu su ston pa// rang bzhin rnam par 'jug pa 'dir yang
27a6(mdo sde): 'od gang rnams thabs dang yang dag spyod phyir zhugs// thams cad dngos la sems pa rten med cing // mtshan ma spangs la rtog par 'gyur med pa// dran par byed pa dag ni 'dir yang 'ong //
27a7(mdo sde): bdag gis bzod pa mchog 'di rab bstan nas// ji ltar sdug bsngal kun la mi gnas pa// chos kyi 'khor lo la yang khyod myur 'jug/ srid mtsho las kyang sems can rab thar byed// phyogs
27b1(mdo sde): bcung thub pa'i dbang po gang dag kyang // 'gro ba rnam la phan phyir 'khor lo bskor// dadung theg pa'i dam tshig gang 'dod pa// bdag gi gan du byang chub sems dpa' mthong // 'an gnyis su yang /
27b2(mdo sde): 'khor lo bdag bskor te// phyir mi ldog pa sems can bye bkod pa/ rnam par grol ba'i blo mtshan ba thogs shing // bdag bdag zhing rnams su yong 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing 'dir 'ongs pa gang
27b3(mdo sde): dag kyang // byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir bzod pa bstan// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa can mthong ste// de bas mu stegs gzhan kun 'dir 'dul lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzanas kyi
27b4(mdo sde): 'khor de yang de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi yi ge dang don dang / tshig brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med par song ngo // de na sems can gang la la theg pa/
27b5(mdo sde): chen po yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad nyan cing de phyogs bcur yang lta bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gis blta ba'i sems can de sems can gang gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de ltar yid du 'ong ba
27b6(mdo sde): de ltar dga' ba/ de ltar mngon par dga' ba/ de ltar zab cing sems can gyi dbugs 'byin pa/ de ltar tshim pa de ltar 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro ba/ don dang tshig dang yi ge brjod pa'i dbyangs
27b7(mdo sde): kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du smra bar bya ba ji lta ba der/ de phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas te// sangs rgyas kyi mthus spos kyi ngang ldang ba'i ri la drang srong thub pa dbang po'i zhing / thugs ni ba dul ba
28a1(mdo sde): dang zhi ba'i mchog thob pa/ gser gyi phung po ji ltar 'bar ba la drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya skyong mang pos mngon sum du phyag 'tshal te/ ha cang yang mi ring bar
28a2(mdo sde): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong 'di ni mthu chen po drang srong gi 'khor chen po 'di ni snying rje chen po dang ldan par 'gyur pa zhig snyam ste/ gal te snying rje dang ldan
28a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba zhig rjes su 'gro'o// drang srong gi cha byad dang / lus dang dbyibs kyis bdag gi lus su gyur pa de dag mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang drang srong du gyur na//
28a4(mdo sde): drang srong chen po de la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o// de dag kyang sems bskyed ma thag pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa las/ drang
28a5(mdo sde): srong gi cha byad tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med cing / dpag tu med pa chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngon par lhag
28a6(mdo sde): so/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis drang srong thub pa la mchod pa byas nas/ drang srong thub pa gang na pa de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyags tshul nas
28a7(mdo sde): bstod de 'khod do// la la smon lam gyi dbang dang / la la ngan du spyod pa'i rkyen gyis gang yang ngan song du skyes pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus drang ba so sor thob nas/ drang srong gi cha byad
28b1(mdo sde): kyis kun tu 'khod do// drang srong chen po thub pa'i dbang po gang na ba de logs su yang thal mo sbyar te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyis tshogs
28b2(mdo sde): mthas yas pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya thub pa bzhugs shing / ji lta bur 'khor yang dag par 'ong ba la yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i
28b3(mdo sde): mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di gang na ston par 'gyur/ de nas de nyid kyi tshen/ shar phyogs kyi nam mkha' lam las khyang pa brtsegs par lta na sdug pa rin po ches
28b4(mdo sde): bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste dper na/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa lta bu/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so//
28b5(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po khang pa brtsegs pa de mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste dpeg
28b6(mdo sde): tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba 'di 'dra bar sprul te/ drang srong thub pa gang na bzhugs pa der/ bdag bzod pa 'di bstan skam pa dang
28b7(mdo sde): de nyid tshen lho phyogs kyi nam mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug po rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ dper na tshangs pa mi mdzod kyi bdag por
29a1(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba lta bu/ bye ba zag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags pa mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' las pa'i rgyal po de 'di
29a2(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa chen po glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de 'dra bar mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das den bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam pa
29a3(mdo sde): dang de nas de nyid kyi tshe na nub phyogs kyi nam mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyis
29a4(mdo sde): gang ba sna tshogs khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lpags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis khang pa
29a5(mdo sde): brtsegs pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de 'dra ba mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das de na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam pa dang / de nas de nyid
29a6(mdo sde): kyi tshen byang phyogs nas nam mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa chen po ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang
29a7(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa/ dor ba med pa dang ldan pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so// de nas yang de'i tshe na khang pa brtsegs pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nam mkha' la 'khod
29b1(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpar byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ khang pa 'artsegs pa de dag te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir seng bye'i khyi la rnam par btus te/ ma/
29b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir seng ge'i khri bshams pa'i khang pa 'artsegs pa gang zhig snyam n+ta/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces
29b3(mdo sde): smras so// rigs kyi bu khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gang du lpags/ spu'i byin gyis brlabs/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la smras pa/
29b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bas na/ chos kyi sgos chags pa thams cad tshun bcad pa'i phyir/ dadung mi sgrub kyi 'di ga nyis kyi 'khor ba 'khyil ba'i sgrub bo// rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o// 'di
29b5(mdo sde): gnyis ni 'byung ba dang 'jig pa zhes bya ste/ gang mi skye mi 'byung ba de 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i 'du shes kyang med do// de 'jig pa thams cad spangs nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob/ 'khor ba'i
29b6(mdo sde): rgyur gcod pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo'o// gang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'di gnyis na 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o// rigs kyi bu gang bdag tu sgro 'dogs pa med pa dang / srog dang gso ba dang /
29b7(mdo sde): gang zag dang / shes las skyes pa dang / shed can dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i 'du shes su 'jug pa med/ 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang skyes pa 'am/
30a1(mdo sde): ma skyes par rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang 'byung ba dang 'gog par rnam par mi rtog cing / 'gro ba dang 'ong bar dmigs pa med pa dang / za dad par bya ba med pa dang / 'gyur/
30a2(mdo sde): ba med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgro la 'jug pa'o// nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / phung po skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid
30a3(mdo sde): 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang phung po yongs su shes shing / skye ba dang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa/ rlom sems thams cad bcom pa/ gzugs kyi 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'di ni gnyis su med
30a4(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// 'gul ba dang rlom zhing sems par rig pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang tshor ba'i 'gul ba med cing rlom sems med pa/ g.yo ba med cing yid la mi byed pa 'di ni
30a5(mdo sde): gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang tshor bar shes pa dang / tshor ba kun 'byung bar shes pa dang / tshor ba'i 'gog par shes pa dang / tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam du
30a6(mdo sde): shes pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang yang tshor ba kun 'byung ba 'gog par 'gro bar mi shes pa dang / gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po'i mtshan nyid tha dad par mi shes pa dang
30a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa dang / mtshan nyid mang por mi shes pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos
30b1(mdo sde): ci sgrol 'jug pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang phung po dang khams dang / skye mched la nyan thos dang / rang byang dub 'dod pa dang blan med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa 'di ni gA'is
30b2(mdo sde): la rigs kyi bu gang yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rten par mi shes pa dang / yi ge'i
30b3(mdo sde): tshig gi lam thams cad ni gnas med pa yi ge med pa/ spros pa med par rab tu shes pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang dge ba dang / mi dge
30b4(mdo sde): bar 'du shes kun tu shes pa dang / pha rol dang / tshu rol du shes pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang dge ba dang / mi dge ba 'di yang mtshan ma med pa kun nas ldang ba dang / mi
30b5(mdo sde): zad pa kun tu rtog pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang tshu rol ni zad pa'o// pha rol ni phyin ci log ste gang tshu rol dang / pha rol na rtog/
30b6(mdo sde): pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / dkrol ba 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang yang tshu rol dang pha rol la 'dzin pa med pa dang dkrol ba med pa dang / ci la'ang brtags pa med pa dang / btang ba med pa 'di ni gnyis
30b7(mdo sde): su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la zag pa dang / bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa 'am zhes rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o//
31a1(mdo sde): gang yang khams dang / skye mched la zag pa dang bcas pa zhes rtog pa med pa dang / zag pa med pa'i 'du shes su bya ba'ang med pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du shes med min/
31a2(mdo sde): thob pa 'ang med pa 'di yang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang phung po dang / khams dang skye mtshad la 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas su rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang
31a3(mdo sde): yang de 'du byed skye mched thams cad la mi rtog cing / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'di yang / rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos
31a4(mdo sde): kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la bsnyems pa 'di gnyis pa'o// gang la la 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la
31a5(mdo sde): mi 'jug mi 'gro/ rnam par mi 'gro/ mi rgal zhing / 'gro ba yang med/ rnam par 'grol ba med pa'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang la la ming dang
31a6(mdo sde): gzugs las phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched 'byung bar rab tu shes pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// phung po dang khams dang / skye mched dang / ming dang gzugs bral ba la sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis lta ba kun
31a7(mdo sde): tu 'gro zhing kun du mi 'gro// yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang rnam par shes pa 'byung bar ra
31b1(mdo sde): tu shes pa 'dir gnyis pa'o// gang yang 'byung ba med pa gang cig ma dang / skang cig ma ma yin pa la 'dus byas thams cad du myur d+ha rab tu shes pa 'di yang gnyis su med pa ngos kyi sgrol 'jug pa'o//
31b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bdag gir bya ba dang / rnam par shes par yongs su shes pa dang / nga yir bya ba dang / skye mched la chags pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang la la bdag dang bral ba'i rnam par shes pa
31b3(mdo sde): thob pa/ bdag gi rang bzhin lta pa gnyis dang bral ba/ skye mched nyams pa med pa/ bdag gir bya ba dang / nga yir bya ba dang bral ba 'di yang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// gang
